content:
Two powerful fires in Russian factories. At one of the largest defensive plants "Uralmash" in Yekaterinburg, the shop was burned, strong fire and smoke clubs were today and at the Electric Isolite plant in the Moscow region.

The 25th Separate Airborne Sicheslav Brigade repelled a powerful assault near the village of Tonenke in the Avdeevsky direction. On March 30, the enemy threw 36 tanks and 12 infantry vehicles - lost 12 tanks and 8 BMPs.

Operators of the "Horror from Heaven" unit of the 123rd Territorial Defense Brigade showed their updated powerful drones that blow up the occupiers on the left bank of the Dnipro River in the Kherson region.

Cyberfachivtsi of the Security Service of Ukraine detained another agent of Russian intelligence, which corrected rocket and aroma blows on Kharkiv.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Junior Lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Senior Lieutenant Artem Golub.
title: Destroyed orc column, factories are burning in Russia, drones are becoming more powerful: a stream from the frontline city
description: The 25th Separate Airborne Sicheslav Brigade repelled a powerful assault near the village...
author: Army Inform
